resources.string:
Question is simple to use, straight and forward.

 Press “Refresh” to get Latitude, Longitude or Address if they don’t show.

 Now by pressing “Question - Map” it will show your current location within the Map.

Click the small box on the top-right to take you to your current location.

 Click on the group-box to change through different types of maps, like Satellite, Hybrid and etc.

 Save your current location by clicking “Save My Location”. Enter your location title and details of your location will be shown. Now click “Save” to finally save your location.

 By clicking “My Places” it will show all of the places you’ve saved, by clicking on one of the places it will show the place details, or long-click on the place to delete it.
